trans-unit.source: Identifies a cell in the grid.

The DataGridCell can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to get or set the value of any cell.

Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to a DataGridCell causes the focus to move to the cell specified by the DataGridCell.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> class.
The number of a row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
The number of a column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
Gets or sets the number of a column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.

You can use the ColumnNumber value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> is identical to a second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>.
An object you are to comparing.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the second object is identical to the first; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a hash value that can be added to a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
A number that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
Gets or sets the number of a row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
You can use the RowNumber value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
Gets the row number and column number of the cell.
A string containing the row number and column number.
